I originally purchased this dress in my normal size and a size up to see which fit better. My normal size fit as expected the larger size wasn't much bigger; I decided to keep the larger size in case the dress shrunk at all during washing. I'll 100% be purchasing other patterns!

I'm 7 month pregnant looking for a dress for my baby shower. I loved this dress. But I ultimately decided to return it because it wasn't the right shade of green I wanted to match my shower aesthetic and I personally did not like the waistline hitting arround my belly. I wanted a smocked top with the waistline under my boobs and to get that, I would have to alter the dress thereby shortening the hemline, and I loved the maxi length since Baby has gotten so big I can no longer keep my knees together. It was super comfortable and breathable. I really wished it came in more colors and patterns! I loved the sleeves though they did kind of accentuate my broad shoulders and small head. I have saved this dress to my wishlist to maybe purchase again for a future event. OVERALL: great dress, worth the buy, flattering, comfortable, and GOOD FOR MATERNITY!

I had to buy a new summer dress because I have lost 200 lbs. and I needed something to wear for my mother's memorial service this spring in New York State where we are from. We are taking mom home for interment. The dress is the right length and it fits so well after losing all of the weight. I could not believe that the size I picked was perfect and the color is one of my mom's favorite colors. She would love the color and love it on me. It will be a perfect dress for this time of the season on the lakes with just a light sweater which I have (it is one of hers; we would actually be the same size now with my weight loss). The price was just right also considering money is tight right now.
